QuestData.Title: Aerial Reconnaissance
QuestData.Description:
The temple grounds are crawling with those loyal to the Forsworn.
If I were still an aspirant, this task would be monumental. Luckily, that is no longer the case.
Let us survey the situation from the sky. We can both take stock of the challenges ahead and find any survivors we can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Kleia to find the survivors.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Voitha in the Temple of Humility.
